pkgmetadata.longdescription: Document Conversion to 'PDF' or 'PNG' // Functions to convert 'Microsoft Word' or 'Microsoft PowerPoint' documents to 'PDF' format and also for converting them into a thumbnail. In order to work, 'LibreOffice' must be installed on the machine and possibly 'python' and 'Microsoft Word'. If the latter is available, it can be used to produce PDF documents identical to the originals, otherwise, 'LibreOffice' is used.
